jcolibri.evaluation.evaluators
Class NFoldEvaluator

java.lang.Object
  jcolibri.evaluation.Evaluator
      jcolibri.evaluation.evaluators.NFoldEvaluator

public class NFoldEvaluator
extends Evaluator

This evaluation method divides the case base into several folds (indicated by the user). For each fold, their cases are used as queries and the remaining folds are used together as case base. This process is performed several times.

Author:
Juan A. Recio García - GAIA http://gaia.fdi.ucm.es
